panels.title: Summary

targets.expr: count(sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster=~'$cluster'}[1h])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)") > 0.95)

panels.title: Nodes with average CPU usage over 1h above threshold

targets.expr: count(sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster=~'$cluster'}[24h])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)") > 0.75)

panels.title: Nodes with average CPU usage over 24h above threshold

targets.expr: count(avg_over_time(instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~'$cluster'}[1h]) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)") > 0.85)

panels.title: Nodes with average Memory usage over 1h above threshold

targets.expr: count(avg_over_time(instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~'$cluster'}[24h]) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)") > 0.75)

panels.title: Nodes with average Memory usage over 24h above threshold
CPU Usage - $NodeGroup

targets.expr: sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster='$cluster'}[1h])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: Average CPU usage per Node over 1 hour

targets.expr: avg((sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster='$cluster'}[1h])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average CPU usage per Node Group over 1 hour

targets.expr: (sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster='$cluster'}[$__rate_interval])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: CPU usage per Node

targets.expr: avg((sum by (instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',cluster='$cluster'}[24h])) / on (instance) instance:node_num_cpu:sum) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average CPU usage per Node Group over 24 hours

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: CPU requested per node

targets.expr: avg(sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average CPU requested per node group

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: CPU limits per node

targets.expr: avg(sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="cpu"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average CPU limits per node group
Memory Usage - $NodeGroup

targets.expr: avg_over_time(instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h]) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: Average Memory usage per Node over 1 hour

targets.expr: avg(avg_over_time(instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~"$cluster"}[1h]) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average Memory usage per Node Group over 1 hour

targets.expr: instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~"$cluster"} * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: Memory usage per Node

targets.expr: avg(avg_over_time(instance:node_memory_utilisation:ratio{cluster=~"$cluster"}[24h]) * on (instance) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average Memory usage per Node Group over 24 hours

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: Memory requested per Node

targets.expr: avg(sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Average Memory requested per Node Group

targets.expr: sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)")

panels.title: Memory limits per Node

targets.expr: avg(sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster"} and on (pod, namespace, cluster) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", cluster=~"$cluster"} == 1 ) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{cluster=~"$cluster", resource="memory"}) * on (node) group_left (label_elastisys_io_node_group) label_replace(kube_node_labels{label_elastisys_io_node_group=~"$NodeGroup"}, "instance", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))
